message: Considering inflation's impact, a 55-45 split seems more equitable this round.
Counteroffer, factoring in inflation's growing impact on me
Given the increasing impact of inflation, especially on my side, I propose a 57.5-42.5 split to reach a fair agreement soon.
Urgent compromise, as inflation is severely impacting my share
Inflation is hitting us hard, especially me. Let's settle on a 60-40 split to end this before our shares lose even more value.
